title: SoccerEvent
description: Canonical schema for a detected soccer event in the processing pipeline

source_file.description: Relative path from NAS_MOUNT_PATH to source video

timestamp_start.description: Event start time in seconds from video start

timestamp_end.description: Event end time in seconds from video start

reel_targets.description: Which output reels this event contributes to

player_track_id.description: ByteTrack persistent player ID (null if not player-specific)

frame_start.description: Source frame number where event begins

frame_end.description: Source frame number where event ends

bounding_box.description: Primary subject bounding box at event peak frame (normalized 0-1)

field_position.description: Field coordinate of event (requires homography calibration)

reviewed.description: True if a human has manually reviewed/confirmed this event

review_override.description: Human override: true=include, false=exclude, null=use confidence threshold
